title: RAD
extract: Definition of rad. (Entry 1 of 3) : a unit of absorbed dose of ionizing radiation equal to an energy of 100 ergs per gram of irradiated material. rad.
extract_html: Definition of rad. (Entry 1 of 3) : a unit of absorbed dose of ionizing radiation equal to an energy of 100 ergs per gram of irradiated material. rad.
